original_title: Bad Boys for Life: Ply Festival DVD 2004
overview: Bad-boy rockers The Bones, Demented Are Go, Damnation and Die Hunns (with Duane Peters, U.S. Bombs, Corey Parks and Nashville Pussy) detonate the stage with their hard-driving sounds in this concert film of the 2004 Where the Bad Boys Rock Tour. Tracks include "Pumpin' Gas, Denial, Home Sweet Hell, Chrome," "Love Seeps Like a Festering Sore," "Sickness of Truth," "Swine," "California Demons," "Time Has Come Today" and more.
title: Bad Boys for Life: Ply Festival DVD 2004
